Posts.Content: jp7358jp wrote: I just noticed a few days ago that on the areola part I seem to have black spots.  I never had these spots before.  It is on both breast in the areola parts but mostly more on one than the other.  Should I be concerned.  I am a 34 yr. old mother of 4 and I have had one mamogram once before aprox 5 years ago because when I was about 25 years old I had once felt a lump and for a very long time I did have a small discharge.  But the doctors said they did not see anything and they thought that it was just hormonal.  Are these spots something to be worried about.
